ygData.subject: Hello and welcome
ygData.msgSnippet: We re a small group so far, but hopefully we ll get more action soon!  Feel free to introduce yourself either /ooc or in character! I m Phoeble, Monk of the
ygData.messageBody:
We're a small group so far, but hopefully we'll get more action soon! Feel
free to introduce yourself either /ooc or in character!

I'm Phoeble, Monk of the Ashen Order, Freeport. Lately I've spent most of my
time in the E. Commonlands and around Rivervale. Hobbies include kicking
skeletons and running from griffins. I have recently attained the 10th rank
and look forward to seeing any of you should you be in Freeport.

Safe journeys, Friends!
